Rich,
The plan is to have the book of the JuBi and Yagyu display ready in time for the Tampa show in February.  The photography is finished and the text is being proof read now.  

The paparazzi were out in force at the SF show.  Note that Gordon also makes an uncredited appearance in the upper right photo above the Yagyu tsuba.  He's in the special "dai" gloves.  That's Alan Harvie to Gordon's left and Julie Duncan in the background.

Jim



  my copy of this months NCJSC mag and was salivating over the Yagyu 
  collection, as well as the description of all of the Kodogu and Koshirae 
  in the back but ohhhhh were are all the pictures LOL.

  So, does anyone have a rough idea when the NBTHK A will be releasing the 
  book ?????

  cheers all

  Rich

  p.s. Both Gordon and Jim look very dappa in their mug shots :-) Nice to 
  finally put a face to all the emails Jim.
